comment: 上課教室在雲和街大樓二樓，地址為雲和街1號(位於雲和小火鍋斜對面、Cafe a la mode正對面)，從師大側門右轉看見Starbucks右轉進入巷子步行約2分鐘(130公尺)，右手邊就會看到雲和街大樓，亦可使用Google Maps APP查詢位置。請同學使用學生證感應，進出雲和街上課教室。
description: This course introduces students to a wide range of semantic phenomena and issues in formal semantics, adopting a truth-conditional account of meaning. Topics covered include propositional and predicate logic, generalized quantifier theory, semantic inference relations, definite descriptions, genericity, representation of NPs (including mass, collectives and bare plurals), thematic roles, tense, aspect and modality .
goals: introduces students to a wide range of semantic phenomena and issues in formal semantics, adopting a truth-conditional account of meaning.
syllabus:
Course Description
------------------

This course aims to discuss various topics in semantics in depth, focusing on lexical semantics, formal semantics, cognitive semantics, aspectuality, and modality. 

Course Requirements
-------------------

Presentation            40%

Term paper              40%

Attendance, Participation, etc.   20%
